it should have somthing like that, change 69 that to whatever you think you want it to be.

item = 861	Magic_shortbow	Short_and_magical,_but_still_effective.	5000	5000	5000	0	0	0	0	69	0	0	0	0	0	0	0

item.title: ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~need help ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~!
item.dc:creator: @I_AM_LEGEND I_AM_LEGEND
item.description:
@I_AM_LEGEND wrote:

how do i change the max hit of range?

right now all u can hit is like 15 when your 99 range with a mage bow…

public void CalculateRange() { double MaxHit = 0; int RangeBonus = playerBonus[5]; // Range Bonus int Range = playerLevel[4]; // Range { MaxHit += (double) (1.05 + (double) ((double) (RangeBonus * Range) * 0.0175)); } MaxHit += (double) (Range * 0.1); playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit); }

do i do something to that?

Read full topic
